NewStore.Description: Allow to add a new store in the Saloon.

EnableRobinSellNewThings.Description: Allow Robin sale a more things

EnableTravelerSellNewThings.Description: Allow the Traveler sale a more things

EnableMarnieSellNewThings.Description: Allow Marnie sale a more things

EnableDesertTraderSellNewThings.Description: Allow the Desert Trader to sale more things

EnableClintSellNewThings.Description: Allow Clint to sale more things

EnableIslandTraderSellNewThings.Description: Allow the Island Trader to sale more things

EnablePierreSellNewThings.Description: Allow the Pierre to sale more things

BetterHaley.Description: Allow to add new Dialogues, Schedules, and custom maps related to Haley.

BetterSam.Description: Allow to add new Dialogues, Schedules, and custom maps related to Sam.

BetterSebastian.Description: Allow to add new Dialogues, Schedules, and custom maps related to Sebastian.

MoreGiftsDialogues.Description: Disable/Enable the new dialogues if you give a specific gift to the villagers.

PhoneCalls.Description: Disable/Enable the new Phonecalls with the Villagers.

BlueChickensHaveBlueEggsAndMayo.Description: Allow the Blue Chickens to have blue eggs and Mayo!

GoldenChickensHaveBigGoldenEggsAndMayo.Description: Allow the Golden Chickens to have Big Golden Eggs and Mayo!

OstrichMayonnaise.Description: Add a Mayonnaise of the Ostrich!

BuyableOstriches.Description: Allows you to buy Ostriches from Marnie's Animal store!

BuyableDinosaurs.Description: Allows you to buy Dinosaurs from Marnie's Animal store!

BuyableBlueChickens.Description: Allows you to buy Blue Chickens from Marnie's Animal store separated!

BuyableGoldenChickens.Description: Allows you to buy Golden Chickens from Marnie's Animal store!

BuyableVoidChickens.Description: Allows you to buy Void Chicken from Marnie's Animal store!

NewFarmAnimals.Description: Allows you to add more FarmAnimals to the game.

MorePets.Description: Allow to add more pets to the game.

ChickenPrice.Description: Purchase Price. Set it to half of the value you want as marnie charges (2x) Default: 400

BlueChickenPrice.Description: Purchase Price. Set it to half of the value you want as marnie charges (2x) Default: 10000

DinosaurPrice.Description: Purchase Price. Set it to half of the value you want as marnie charges (2x) Default: 6000

GoldenChickenPrice.Description: Purchase Price. Set it to half of the value you want as marnie charges (2x) Default: 12000

CowPrice.Description: Purchase Price. Set it to half of the value you want as marnie charges (2x) Default: 750

DuckPrice.Description: Purchase Price. Set it to half of the value you want as marnie charges (2x) Default: 600

GoatPrice.Description: Purchase Price. Set it to half of the value you want as marnie charges (2x) Default: 2000

RabbitPrice.Description: Purchase Price. Set it to half of the value you want as marnie charges (2x) Default: 4000

SheepPrice.Description: Purchase Price. Set it to half of the value you want as marnie charges (2x) Default: 4000

PigPrice.Description: Purchase Price. Set it to half of the value you want as marnie charges (2x) Default: 8000

OstrichPrice.Description: Purchase Price. Set it to half of the value you want as marnie charges (2x) Default: 15000

VoidChickenPrice.Description: Purchase Price. Set it to half of the value you want as marnie charges (2x) Default: 11000

ChangePetAdoptionMultiplier.Description: Enable/Disable the Pet Adoption Price Multiplier.

WizardBook.Description: Build the Wizard Book on your Farm

BuildableCassinoCalicoJackLow.Description: Buildable Cassino Jack Low Table in your Farm.

BuildableCassinoCalicoJackHigh.Description: Buildable Casino Slot Machines in your Farm.

BuildableCassinoCalicoSlotMachines.Description: Buildable Casino Slot Machines in your Farm.

BuildableCassinoCalicoBuyQICoins.Description: Buildable Qi's Coin Machine in your Farm.

BuildableCassinoCalicoComputer.Description: Buildable Qi's Computer in your Farm.

BuildableGreenhouse.Description: You can build the Greenhouse in your Farm with Robin.

FruitTree.Description: Allow the new Trees to exist.

NewCustomGreenhouse.Description: Add a custom Greenhouse to replace the Original.

NewCustomBigShed3.Description: Add a new custom Giant Shed.

IslandFarmCellar.Description: Add a Cellar to the Island Farm House.

NewCustomFarmHouseCellar.Description: Add a Custom Cellar to the FarmHouse Cellar.

MuseumExpanded.Description: Replace the Museum to a new version.

BuildableWitchShrines.Description: You can build WitchHut Shrines on your farm.

BuildingsItems.Description: Adds items to be default if you have the Deluxe buildings (Deluxe Coop, Deluxe Barn)

IndestructibleYesOrNot.Description: Whether items are indestructible or not (In Deluxe Coop and Deluxe Barn)

BoardReplacer.Description: Replace the Special Order Board texture with a new and seasonal beautiful textures.

OvergrownMailbox.Description: Replace the Mailbox texture with a new and seasonal beautiful textures (textures by Medinaquirin).

PlantAncientSeedsInAnySeason.Description: Now you can Plant the 'Ancient Seed' in any Season.

CommunityCenterAnvil.Description: Allow the new Anvil in the Community Center to exist and be functional.

CommunityCenterFarmerStatistics.Description: Allow the new Farmer Statistics in the Community Center to exist and be functional.

CommunityCenterBobbersMachine.Description: Allow the new Bobbers Machine in the Community Center to exist and be functional.

CommunityCenterPrizeMachine.Description: Allow the new Prize Machine in the Community Center to exist and be functional.

CommunityCenterKitchen.Description: Allow the new Kitchen in the Community Center to be functional.

CommunityCenterDyePot.Description: Allow the new Dye Pots in the Community Center to be functional.

CommunityCenterJukebox.Description: Allow the new Jukebox in the Community Center to exist and be functional.

CommunityCenterTailoringTable.Description: Allow the new Tailoring Table in the Community Center to be functional.

NewMachines.Description: Allow to add new Machines to your game.

BuyableMachines.Description: Allow to buy the new Machines.

BetterMachines.Description: Allow all the machines modifications: Bookcase, Stardew Hero Trophy, Decorative Pitcher, Soda Machine and all below...

EnableArtifacts.Description: Enables artifacts to be recycled in the Recycling Machine.

PrismaticShardInCrystalarium.Description: Allow to put Prismatic Shard and the Cinder Shard in the Crystalarium.

BetterMayonnaiseMachine.Description: Allow to put Blue and Golden Eggs in the Mayonnaise Machine.

MoreTeleportToMinecart.Description: Add more teleport using the Minecarts.

BuildableMinecart.Description: Build the Minecart on your Farm

BeachMinecart.Description: Add a new Minecart in the Beach.

DesertMinecart.Description: Add a new Minecart in the Desert.

ForestMinecart.Description: Add a new Minecart in the Forest.

SecretWoodsMinecart.Description: Add a new Minecart in the SecretWoods.

RailRoadMinecart.Description: Add a new Minecart in the RailRoad.

IslandFarmMinecart.Description: Add a new Minecart in the Island Farm.

EastScarpMinecart.Description: Add a new Minecart in the East Scarp Village.

RidgesideVillageMinecart.Description: Add a new Minecart in the Ridgeside Village.

SunberryVillageMinecart.Description: Add a new Minecart in the Sunberry Village.

MorePlantableArea.Description: Allows you to plant in certain areas of the island farm.

GrowAndSpreadOnDirt.Description: Allows grass to grow and spread on the island's farm dirt.

Item1type.Description: All Itemtypes need a whole number value relating to an object id. All ItemAmounts need a non-zero value

CoffeeItem1type.Description: All Itemtypes need a whole number value relating to an object id. All ItemAmounts need a non-zero value

ChanceToAppearGoldenCoconut.Description: Probability of the Golden Coconut appearing in the store(Traveler), this value will always be affected by the player's daily luck. (0.1 It is equal to 10%)

ChanceToAppearStardropTea.Description: Probability of the Stardrop Tea appearing in the store(Traveler), this value will always be affected by the player's daily luck. (0.1 It is equal to 10%)

ChanceToAppearAutoPetter.Description: Probability of the AutoPetter appearing in the store(Marnie), this value will always be affected by the player's daily luck. (0.1 It is equal to 10%)

MoreRecipes.Description: Activate new crafting and cooking recipes

BuyableCookingRecipes.Description: Disable/Enable the Old Cooking Recipes buyable in the new Store.

DesertFestivalFoods.Description: Disable/Enable the Foods from the Desert Festival Foods Event buyable in the new Store.

MoreSeatingAreas.Description: Added a custom Greenhouse to replace the Original.

NewPaintings.Description: Add more paintings to the game.

NewClothes.Description: Add more clothes to the game.

FestivalOfTheMundane.Description: Add a new Passive Festival in the Sewer.

BuyableAnimalsAlwaysAvailable.Description: Requirement to purchase a dinosaur or an ostrich removed if activated.
